      Divya Kiran Kadiyala, Alexandros Daglis.

    • Exploring Memory Expansion Designs for Training Mixture-of-Experts Models
      Taekyung Heo, Saeed Rashidi, Changhai Man, Divya Kiran Kadiyala, William Won, Sudarshan Srinivasan, Midhilesh Elavazhagan, Madhu Kumar, Alexandros Daglis, Tushar Krishna.

      IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems I (TCAS), 2019. Acceptance rate: 30.0%
